Articles.Content:
I'm considering writing a plugin that will involve moving the camera in the external view (that is, not the map).

Can someone please point me to the relevant documentation? It would be my first KSP mod and I have no idea if this would be easy or what I'll need.

Thanks in advance!

edit: I'm looking at the source of the ImprovedChaseCamera mod and that's very helpful. I don't see anything about FlightCamera in http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com, though. Where's the documentation that I should be using?

Edited January 1, 2015 by nohelmet
